required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Age and Dietary Protein Intake on Myocellular Characteristics Following a Single Bout of Resistance Exercise in Healthy Men

brief_summary.textblock: In the present study, the effects of age and dietary intake will be assessed on myocellular characteristics during 72 hours after a resistance type exercise session.

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle fiber myonuclear and stem cell content
Muscle fiber myonuclear and stem cell content
primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 hours after a single bout of resistance type exercise

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle fiber myonuclear and stem cell content
primary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after a single bout of resistance type exercise

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle fiber myonuclear and stem cell content
primary_outcome.time_frame: 48 hours after a single bout of resistance type exercise

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle fiber myonuclear and stem cell content
primary_outcome.time_frame: 72 hours after a single bout resistance type exercise

clinical_study.condition: Single Bout of Resistance Type Exercise

arm_group.description: During the time of the study this group will adhere to a standardized regular diet.
During the time of the study this group will adhere to a standardized low protein diet.
During the time of the study this group will adhere to a standardized high protein diet.
During the time of the study this group will adhere to a standardized high protein diet

intervention.intervention_name: Adhere to a specific standardized diet for 4 days
intervention.description: 24 h before the start of the intervention all subjects will adhere to a standardized diet for 4 days. Young subjects are randomly allocated to either a low protein diet, regular protein diet or high protein diet group. All elderly subjects will adhere to a regular protein diet comparable to the regular protein diet of the young subjects.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy men between the ages of 18-30 or 70-85 years
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with a recent history or current state of cardiovascular disease, COPD, Parkinson, rheumatoid arthritis, musculoskeletal/orthopaedic disorders, renal disorder, cognitive impairment.
